Initial GWAS data Han Chinese population identify 12 loci potential PCOS susceptibility gene candidate . One locus , DENND1A locus 9q22.32 , replicate GWAS study Asian European population . The large transcript ( DENND1A Variant 1 , DENND1A.V1 ) encode 1009 amino acid protein , small transcript DENND1A.V2 encode truncate 559 amino acid . The product DENND1A.V2 contain DENN domain clathrin-binding domain , differs product DENND1A.V1 two way : ( 1 ) contain proline-rich C-terminal domain present Variant 1 , ( 2 ) DENND1A.V2 result differential splice contains unique 33 amino acid C-terminal sequence . A history liver test abnormality allow two circumstance : ( 1 ) mild bilirubin elevation accept set know Gilbert 's syndrome ; ( 2 ) mild transaminase ( ALT , AST ) elevation may see obese girl , stable elevation < 1.5 time upper limit normal accept group .
